wikipedia_page.main: Alfred Ball (1890 – 3 October 1952) was an English professional footballer who made 97 appearances in the Football League for Lincoln City. He played as an outside left. He also played for Midland League club Mansfield Town and for Ilkeston United of the Central Alliance.

response: * Alf Ball (footballer, born 1890) (1890–1952), English footballer for Lincoln City
* Alf Ball (footballer, born 1873) (1873–1940), English footballer for Leicester Fosse and Preston North End
